oai_dc:dc.dc:title: People removing graffiti from the Qasr al-Nīl Bridge
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fox, Kim
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photographer's description: The day after Mubarak stepped down (Saturday; February 12; 2011) there were cleanup crews everywhere including the Kasr el Nil bridge. This group is removing graffiti.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Demonstrations; Egypt; Protest movements; Revolutions
Graffiti; People
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution Photographs; Rare Books and Special Collections Library; American University in Cairo
